dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 22 × 28.7 cm (8 11/16 × 11 5/16 in.)
inscribed:
Inscribed and titled in plate, lower left to right: COCK EXC / FORTITVDO / BRVEGEL INVENTOR

Two lines of Latin inscribed in plate below image, lower center: ANIMVM VINCERE, IRACVNDIAM COHIBERE CAETERAQ VITIA ETAFFECTVS / COHIBERE VERA FORTITVDO EST.
